Text: How do I get this to work on my TRS-80 Model I?
Ask Ubuntuforums.org. I personally have never used that model of a computer.
Thanks. And thanks for the upload!
so i can turn my Acer Aspire 6920 into a server?

Yes. You can turn pretty much any computer into "a server". This ISO is titled Server Edition because it is best optimized for use as a server. But, you could easily run a server on the Ubuntu Desktop edition.

tl;dr: yes, you can turn your computer into a server, as long as you read the proper guides on how to set it up.
